fail_list_projects: Failed to load the list of projects.
class_rule_description: No spaces are allowed in the name. Each word in the name should start with a capital letter.

BLOCKLY.PARAMETERS_CAN_ONLY_GO_IN_THEIR_METHODS_: Parameters can only go in their method's block
BLOCKLY.EVENT_HANDLER_ALREADY_ON_WORKSPACE: This event handler is already on the workspace.

TOOLTIP.EVALUATE_BUT_IGNORE_RESULT: Executes the connected block and ignores the result.  Allows you to call a function and ignore the return value.
TOOLTIP.OPMODE_TYPE: What sort of OpMode this is
TOOLTIP.OPMODE_ENABLED: Whether the OpMode is shown on Driver Station
TOOLTIP.OPMODE_NAME: The name shown on the Driver Station.  If blank will use the class name.
TOOLTIP.OPMODE_GROUP: An optional group to group OpModes on Driver Station
TOOLTIP.COMPONENTS: These components are visible in this mechanism, the robot, and all opmodes.
TOOLTIP.PRIVATE_COMPONENTS: These components will not be visible in the robot or opmodes. They are only accessible within this mechanism.
TOOLTIP.CALL_CONSTRUCTOR: Constructs an instance of the class {{className}}.
TOOLTIP.CALL_MECHANISM_COMPONENT_INSTANCE_METHOD: Calls the instance method {{className}}.{{functionName}} on the component named {{componentName}} in the mechanism named {{mechanismName}}.
TOOLTIP.CALL_COMPONENT_INSTANCE_METHOD: Calls the instance method {{className}}.{{functionName}} on the component named {{componentName}}.
TOOLTIP.CALL_MECHANISM_INSTANCE_METHOD: Calls the instance method {{className}}.{{functionName}} on the mechanism named {{mechanismName}}.

WARNING.CALL_COMPONENT_INSTANCE_METHOD_PRIVATE_C: This blocks calls a method on a private component in the {{mechanismClassName}} mechanism.
WARNING.CALL_COMPONENT_INSTANCE_METHOD_MISSING_C: This block calls a method on a component that no longer exists.
WARNING.CALL_MECHANISM_COMPONENT_INSTANCE_METHOD: This block calls a method on a component that belongs to a mechanism that no longer exists.
WARNING.CALL_ROBOT_INSTANCE_METHOD_INSIDE_MECHAN: This block is not allowed to be used inside a mechanism.
WARNING.CALL_ROBOT_INSTANCE_METHOD_MISSING_METHO: This block calls a method that no longer exists in the robot.
WARNING.CALL_MECHANISM_INSTANCE_METHOD_INSIDE_ME: This block is not allowed to be used inside a mechanism.
WARNING.CALL_MECHANISM_INSTANCE_METHOD_MISSING_M: This block calls a method that no longer exists in the mechanism.
This block calls a method in a mechanism that no longer exists.
